scripts.webpack: webpack --entry ./direct.js -o bundler-dist/webpack/direct && webpack --entry ./index.js -o bundler-dist/webpack/index && webpack --entry ./direct-less-imports.js -o bundler-dist/webpack/direct-less-imports
scripts.parcel: parcel build ./index.js --log-level error --dist-dir ./bundler-dist/parcel/index && parcel build ./direct.js --log-level error --dist-dir ./bundler-dist/parcel/direct && parcel build ./direct-less-imports.js --log-level error --dist-dir ./bundler-dist/parcel/direct-less-imports
scripts.bundle: npm run webpack && npm run esbuild && npm run parcel
